remarks: Obsolete as of 15-Mar-2020.  Lemma for ~ elghomOLD .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
elghomlem1OLD.1 $e |- S = { f | ( f : ran G --> ran H /\ A. x e. ran G A. y e. ran G ( ( f ` x ) H ( f ` y ) ) = ( f ` ( x G y ) ) ) } $.
elghomlem1OLD $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp ) -> ( G GrpOpHom H ) = S ) $.
$d G f x y $.
$d H f x y $.
